testsuite.name: | 1 | 1 | Value can not be less than 5 characters. | |

testcase.classname: | 1 | 1 | Value can not be less than 5 characters. | |

testcase.name: And I click on the View Profile link

testcase.classname: | 1 | 1 | Value can not be less than 5 characters. | |

testcase.classname: | 1 | 1 | Value can not be less than 5 characters. | |

testcase.name: And I see the confirm password error message
testcase.classname: | 1 | 1 | Value can not be less than 5 characters. | |

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: | 1 | 1 | Value can not be less than 5 characters. | |
